#summary Article descibes setup required to process huge excel files
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

When reading/writing excel file with POI it consumes a lot of memory for parsing content, making a memory requirement ~3Gb processing of large excel ~20Mb. Provided details below on how to make use of streaming API provided by POI to process large file.

= Details =

There are streaming API which enables streaming for reading and streaming for writing.
# http://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/how-to.html#event_api
# http://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/how-to.html#xssf_sax_api
# http://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/how-to.html#sxssf

sqlsheet supports both modes, to enable streaming you need to pass specific preference in JDBC url

=== Read streaming ===
  * Text in *bold* or _italic_
  * Headings, paragraphs, and lists
  * Automatic links to other wiki pages
